Review.Titre: They did a decent job I guess but would not recommend or use again
Review.Contenu: For the price that they charge they really need to do a better job of communicating. On the website I was told that a discord channel would be set up for me to be able to easily communicate with the booster. However, I was told they wouldn't do it and to just contact them through their live support chat. The Live support agents were generally quick to respond though so that was a plus but they are not the ones boosting the character so a lot of the times if you have questions they won't be able to answer. Even though the website said an estimate of 7 days to complete the boost, the live agent had told me it would be done in 5 days so I set my expectations accordingly. However, the booster didn't even log onto my character until the 3rd day and ended up taking the full 7 days even though I was told, on 2 separate occasions, that it would be 5 days. Finally, I had logged onto my character before the boost was finished as I needed the account back to raid with my guild and checked on the progress and leveled my character a bit before giving it back to the booster to complete. When I got my character back, I noticed that they had taken nearly 500-600 gold from my character at that point. When I asked about this, the agent was rude and said that they should have taken more gold as they only leave me account with the gold that was there when they get it and don't leave any of the gold earned through questing during the boost. This would have been fine had they communicated this to me. It does not say on their website either that this is what they do. I have seen other services that charge the same but will leave all the gold earned during questing on the character. I will not be using their services again and do not recommend that anyone else do so as well.

Review.Titre: Got what I paid for but not without confusion...
Review.Contenu: They were really good with chatting with me on their website ASAP, but the actual transfer got confusing. They called me (at midnight mind you, about 8 hours after I bought it) and said they could meet me online to trade me it or mail it, I said sure im loading my game I can meet you in 30 seconds. They then said they would just mail it since I wasnt right there, I said ok no problem. 3 hours later, came on to do pre bedtime dailies real quick, and I had no gold in my mail lol.... so I checked with them, apparently they'd sent it 2.5 hours after they asked to meet me, and it was only 2/3 of what I ordered. The next day when I logged on, the other 1/3 of what I purchased was in there. It was a little messy for sure, Why would they call me late at night, offer to give it to me right there, then have it take them hours just to give me a partial amount of my purchase? It was cheaper than other gold services, yes, and overall I did get my gold at a good price, but I wouldn't recommend them if you need gold the same day. Maybe use them if you don't care about waiting 12-24 hours and saving like 5% off the price of other gold services.

Something clearly went wrong.I placed two orders today, one earlier this afternoon, which went through without a hitch. The second one, however... I paid, did not receive any kind of confirmation e-mail, just the page "order placed" on the site. Then, nothing. I attempted to contact the "24/7 live support" with my order number, however no one was online (I guess it was the 25th hour of the day). An hour later, an operator suddenly appeared, but I was "in queue and my turn would be in approximately 20 minutes". Another hour later, I still didn't get to speak to anyone and there's no one online again.It's definitely a strange experience and I have no idea if and when my issue is going to be resolved.Update: my order was fulfilled the next morning and the company reached out after the negative review, so I'm updating the score to 4/5.
